hadiths.text: It was narrated that Ibn 'Abbas said:"The Messenger of Allah [SAW] said: 'Whoever makes an image will be punished until (he is commanded) to breathe a soul into it, and he will not be able to do so

chapter.ara-name: باب ذِكْرِ مَا يُكَلَّفُ أَصْحَابُ الصُّوَرِ يَوْمَ الْقِيَامَةِ
chapter.eng-name: What the Image-Makers Will be Commanded to Do on the Day of Resurrection
